short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the internet as you want to.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On social media sites, the Algo-Free mode hides the algorithmic content. On social media sites it hides the algorithmic feed. On video sites it makes sure that you will not fall into a binge-watching hole, but still allows you to watch specific videos that you search up. On news sites you can hide the newsfeed but still read articles from links. 

On select website you can customize your own algorithm! Describe what you want to see on your feed and Antidote will make it happen.

Antidote allows you to use the internet with different modes “Algo-Free”, “Monk-Mode”, and “Newsfeed-Free” to customize the way you use different websites and platforms. 

With Monk-Mode you can block out all content from a website. These features can help you find more time to do productive work or to use technology with the purpose it was designed with: to make your life better.

All of the features can be customized easily on each website. Antidote remembers your preferences and you can request any new website where you would like to add a custom mode. 

Antidote disables or hides the algorithmic elements of websites both feeds, newsfeeds and distracting content in general. We have extensive support features for Antidote. Please reach out with any questions you may have.
